author: Simon A Chester
title: Joey Porter will coach against Chiefs after reinstatement by Steelers
text:
Having seen the charges against him reduced on Thursday by the Pittsburgh DA, there have been plenty of rumors circulating the internet suggesting the troubled linebacker coach would soon be back on the sidelines. On Friday morning the Steelers made it official, with a release of a statement by Art Rooney II to confirm the team’s position regarding his status with the franchise.
#Steelers announce LB coach Joey Porter will return to the coaching staff, as expected. The statement from Art Rooney II pic.twitter.com/hJWXf1RTsT 
— Ian Rapoport (@RapSheet) January 13, 2017 
Porter is still facing charges relating to disorderly conduct and public drunkenness, but both are summary charges and should ultimately result in a fine.
